Uses of Interface
org.beancp.MapConvention

  • Packages that use MapConvention 
    Package Description
    org.beancp
    Object to object mapping library.
    org.beancp.commons
    Mapping conventions for popular use cases.

    • Uses of MapConvention in org.beancp

      Methods in org.beancp with parameters of type MapConvention 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MapperBuilder MapperBuilder.addMapAnyByConvention(MapConvention... conventions)
      If two data types has no mapping defined by MapperBuilder.addMap(java.lang.Class, java.lang.Class, org.beancp.MapSetup) or any of addConverter methods then this convention will be used.
      Map<S,D> Map.useConvention(MapConvention MapConvention)
      Adds mappings using convention.
